response.overview: In 1000 Civilization: Rich & Poor, a thousand players are split between two islands—one overflowing with resources, the other barren and hostile—sparking the rise of two civilizations shaped by fortune and struggle. As the Rich build cities, armies, and political order, the Poor forge unity through hardship, eventually rising in defiance. What begins as survival quickly spirals into an epic tale of alliances, betrayals, assassinations, and rebellion, where unlikely heroes emerge and nations fall. Through raw human conflict and breathtaking twists, the experiment evolves into a cinematic saga that blurs the line between game and reality, exposing how power, desperation, and hope shape civilization itself.
response.tagline: Two islands. A thousand players. One epic civilization.
response.title: 1000 Civilization: Rich & Poor
